card_text: 3 "The Weather" monsters$NIf this card is Link Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 of your banished "The Weather" monsters. If this Link Summoned card is destroyed: You can Special Summon 1 "The Weather Painter Rainbow" from your Extra Deck.
